dict.string: Mount a network share with automatic discovery
on alfred_script(q) try mount volume "afp://" & q on error mount volume "smb://" & q end try end alfred_script

#!/bin/bash
query="{query}"
HOSTNAME=`hostname`
function escape_hostname { echo $(echo "$@" | sed 's/[^a-zA-Z0-9 -_]//g;s/ _/-/g') }
trap '{ mounted_volumes=$(mount) for host in $hosts; do # password=$(security find-internet-password -l "$host" -w) while read -r line; do if [[ "$line" == *Disk* ]]; then share=$(echo $line | tr -s " " | sed "s/ Disk//g;s/[^a-zA-Z0-9 -_]//g;s/ _/-/g") if [[ $mounted_volumes != *"$host"*"$share"* && ($share =~ "$query" || -z "$query") ]]; then out+="<item arg=\"$host/$share\" uid=\"$host/$share\" valid=\"yes\">\ <title>$share</title>\ <subtitle>on $host</subtitle>\ <icon>icon.png</icon>\ </item>" fi fi done < <(smbutil view -g //@$(echo $host | sed "s/\.local$//g") 2> /dev/null) # strip .local for faster resolution done # shares=`` if [ -z "$out" ]; then out="<item arg=\"$query\" uid=\"$query\" valid=\"yes\">\ <title>Connect to...</title>\ <subtitle>Enter path to network share: <host>/<share></subtitle>\ <icon>icon.png</icon>\ </item>" fi echo "<?xml version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"UTF-8\"?><items>$out</items>" }' EXIT
hosts=(); i=0 while read -r line; do i=`expr $i + 1`
if [ $i -lt 5 ]; then continue; fi # skip the header lines
name=$(echo "$line" | tr -s ' ' | sed 's/^.*_afpovertcp\._tcp\. //g') domain=$(echo $line | tr -s ' ' | cut -d ' ' -f 5) domain="${domain%?}" hostname="$(escape_hostname $name).$domain"
if [[ "$hostname" != "$HOSTNAME" ]]; then hosts+=("$hostname") fi
if [ $(echo $line | cut -d ' ' -f 3) -ne '3' ]; then break; fi # break if no more items will follow
done < <((sleep 0.5; kill -13 0) & # kill quickly if trapped dns-sd -B _afpovertcp._tcp)
# silently kill subprocess kill -13 0 exit 0
